author: cziegeler
msg: SLING-2350 : Sling Maven JSPC Plugin depends on legacy Sling API lib which does not support adaptable SlingHttpServletRequest objects

author: uschindler
msg: LUCENE-3305: Improve TokenInfoDictionaryWriter to use a better allocation strategy (helps GC as it not increments and copies array sizes on every new item, building dict is also faster!). Use additional HashMap for POS lookup.

author: bperroud
msg:
DIRECTMEMORY-48 : Add OffHeapMemoryBuffer interface and abstraction
- OffHeapMemoryBuffer is now an interface, OffHeapMemoryBufferImpl the default implementation
- MemoryManagerServiceImpl has an overridable instanciateOffHeapMemoryBuffer function
- new class org.apache.directmemory.misc.Util that hold crc32
- MemoryManagerServiceImpl to try the first buffer when the last is full
